name: Olivia
description:
Olivia is a game developed for the Jam Ludum Dare 34.

Theme : Two buttons controls, Growing

Olivia is an entity who have to feed a little gravitational cell her aim is to grow it. Unforntunatly, some dangerous objects can collide with the little world. Olivia have to protect it if she want to create life.
Lead Olivia and help her to grow her cell.

Controls : ZQSD to move - O is the repulsive ray - P is the attractive ray

Team :

Amélie Bailly - Yanis Berry - Félix Chamerois - Patrick Chastel - Victoria Guillon - Olivier Lapointe - Laetitia Meyerfeld - Timothée Sonnier
